name: Your world and mine
description:
As a mayor of a small town, it's your job to go out there and find out what the people want - and that's what the Town will invest in. However - you pick which people will be the "representative sample" that decides what the Town wants - and you might have some less than stellar incentives to ensure certain results...

Game made as a part of Warsaw Game Jam Pro 2022, topic being "what is real", in a team of 1, using a bunch of Synty and Animpic studio assets acquired from humble bundles.
